title: Pony Club
brief_description: Shows the activities of the Merriwa Pony Club. Memberships of this club totals 300 boys ad girls, all under 18, who spend their leisure hours roaming the cattle and sheep country of New South Wales. Club activities include herding and tending cattle, race, camping trips, visits to famous stud farms and show riding, leading to participation in the Royal Easter Show.
